Hero.subtitle: Become Death's Envoy or a Shaman, and fend off the swarming evil spirits. Fast-paced roguelike action rooted in Korean folklore.

Lore.text: Every night when the moon bleeds red across the Eight Provinces of Joseon, vengeful spirits and demons begin to run rampant. A tragic shaman who rejected heaven's mandate, and a reaper who defied the laws of the Underworld. Two exorcists embark on a desperate journey of survival, staking their own destinies.

Features.title: Endless Swarms of
Features.desc: A desperate battle for survival against evil spirits from Korean folklore

item1.title: Diverse Demons and Bosses
item1.desc: Dokkaebi, Gumiho, Death's Envoy, and Changgwi — familiar yet bizarre creatures of Joseon attack you at every moment.

item2.title: Shamanic & Reaper Combat
item2.desc: Dokkaebi Fire, Shaman's Jakdu, Moktak, and Talismans. Evolve and combine the unique weapons of the Shaman and Reaper.

item3.title: Mysterious Relic System
item3.desc: Acquire national treasure-class relics like the Silla Golden Crown, Hahoetal Mask, and White Porcelain Moon Jar to unleash unimaginable synergies.

shaman.heading: Heaven-Blessed Shaman
shaman.name: Seola
shaman.desc: A specialist in exorcism who wields Purifying Water and Talismans, summoning Dokkaebi Fire to burn enemies across a wide area.

reaper.heading: Atoning Reaper
reaper.name: Muun
reaper.desc: An executor of souls who wields the Karma Scythe and Death Sword, scaling into devastating power as the battle rages on.
